This class represents an account card that allows the user to select or create an account and play the game.

AiPlayer - Class in model
The class AiPlayer extends the class Player and represents a generic virtual player in a card game.

AiPlayer constructor with aiName and aiStrategy field as parameter
AiPlayer.Strategy - Enum in model
The enumeration Strategy represents possible strategy of virtual player
autoChooseCard(List<Card>, Card) - Method in class model.AiPlayer
Chooses a card to play based on the player's strategy and the rejected card.
autoChooseColor() - Method in class model.AiPlayer
Automatically chooses a color for a wild card based on the player's hand.
